Articles.Content:
Hi! I'm a very strong book reader, and since I started playing KSP, I wanted to learn more (much more) about physics, aerodynamics, orbital mechanics, etc.

What are some recommended books about the topics I just listed?

Thanks!

I don't recall the title, and I have not read it myself, but it seems to come highly recommended.   It's about the history of spaceflight and the various fuels used in it.   Ignition!

Edited December 19, 2020 by Gargamel
Rocket Propulsion Elements, 9th Edition by Sutton and Biblarz.  If you're into propulsion, this book is a must-have.
